DOC.brief_summary: The project will test the hypothesis that lung ventilation during exercise is unaffected by oxygen supplementation. In addition, the acute effect of oxygen supplementation on dyspnoea, heart rate and blood pressure will be studied.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Oxygen Supplementation During Exercise in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Patients
DOC.criteria: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease No exacerbation No active heart disease
